Class Downloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dm.jrt.sample.Downloader

  • public class Downloader
extends Object
    The downloader implementation.

    Created by davide-maestroni on 10/17/2014.

    • Constructor Summary

      Downloader(int maxParallelDownloads)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean abort(URI uri)
      Aborts the download of the specified URI.
      boolean abortAndWait(URI uri, TimeDuration timeout)
      Aborts the download of the specified URI by waiting for the specified timeout for completion.
      void download(URI uri, File dstFile)
      Downloads the specified resources to the destination file.
      static String getFileName(URI uri)
      Utility method to get the name of the downloaded file from its URI.

      Checks if the specified resource was successfully downloaded.
      boolean isDownloading(URI uri)
      Checks if the specified resource is currently downloading.
      static void main(String[] args)
      Main.
      The first argument is the path to the download directory, the second one is the maximum number of parallel downloads, and all the further ones are the URIs of the resources to download.
      boolean waitDone(URI uri, TimeDuration timeout)
      Waits for the specified time for the resource to complete the downloading.

        Constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • getFileName

        public static String getFileName(URI uri)
        Utility method to get the name of the downloaded file from its URI.
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI of the resource to download.
        Returns:
        the file name.

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws IOException,
                        URISyntaxException
        Main.
        The first argument is the path to the download directory, the second one is the maximum number of parallel downloads, and all the further ones are the URIs of the resources to download.
        Parameters:
        args - the arguments.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurred.
        URISyntaxException - if one of the specified URIs is not correctly formatted.

      • abort

        public boolean abort(URI uri)
        Aborts the download of the specified URI.
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI.
        Returns:
        whether the download was running and has been successfully aborted.

      • abortAndWait

        public boolean abortAndWait(URI uri,
                   TimeDuration timeout)
        Aborts the download of the specified URI by waiting for the specified timeout for completion.
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI.
        timeout - the time to wait for the abortion to complete.
        Returns:
        whether the download was running and has been successfully aborted before the timeout elapsed.

      • download

            File dstFile)
        Downloads the specified resources to the destination file.
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI of the resource to download.
        dstFile - the destination file.

        public boolean waitDone(URI uri,
               TimeDuration timeout)
        Waits for the specified time for the resource to complete the downloading.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        whether the resource was successfully downloaded.
